long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NoteX: AI-Powered Notes & Summaries
Full experience AI notetaking at:
Web: https://notexapp.com/
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ai-note-taker-ai-record-notex/id6654910983
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sota.ainotex
----
Simple extension to transform the way you learn and work with NoteX, your intelligent note-taking assistant!

Key Features:
✓ One-Click YouTube Summarization: Instantly generate concise summaries of any YouTube video.
✓ Smart Web Page Notes: Capture and organize key information from any webpage.
✓ AI-Powered Flashcards: Automatically create study aids from your notes and summaries.
✓ Quick Quizzes: Test your understanding with AI-generated questions.
✓ Cloud Sync: Access your notes across all devices.

Perfect for:
✓ Students looking to optimize their study time
✓ Professionals needing to digest lengthy online content quickly
✓ Researchers gathering information from multiple web sources
✓ Anyone wanting to enhance their learning and productivity

How It Works:
✓ Click the NoteX icon while on any webpage or YouTube video.
✓ Let our AI analyze and summarize the content for you.
✓ Review your personalized notes, flashcards, and quizzes.
✓ Sync across devices for learning on-the-go.

Save time, retain more information, and boost your productivity with NoteX. Download now and experience the future of note-taking!
Note: Free version includes limited uses per week. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited access and advanced features.
Privacy Assurance: We value your privacy. NoteX does not collect personal data beyond what's necessary for app functionality.
Tags: note-taking, summarization, AI assistant, study aid, productivity tool
